definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: After that, everybody pelted snowballs at anybody who was riding the sled.
sentences.chinese: 那之後，每個人都對著坐雪橇滑下來的人砸雪球。

sentences.english: First frost meant magic snowball time.
sentences.chinese: 早霜意味着是播種魔法雪球的時候。

sentences.english: The snowballs splatted on the trees.
sentences.chinese: 雪球打在樹上就緊貼上去了。

sentences.english: I have a big globe with a bear in it .
sentences.chinese: 我有一個裏面有熊的大雪球。

sentences.english: Little cookie pound the snowman with snowballs.
sentences.chinese: 小餅乾抓起雪球去砸小雪人。

sentences.english: Today, trying to be cute, my boyfriend threw a snowball at me.
sentences.chinese: 今天男友賣萌捏了一個雪球朝我砸過來。

sentences.english: The snow is not sticky enough, so we couldn't put a head on.
sentences.chinese: 雪沒有足夠的粘性，所以我們不能做頭的雪球。

sentences.english: They often rolled the snowballs in winter.
sentences.chinese: 他們在冬天常常滾雪球玩。

sentences.english: Qiqi wants to have a snow ball fight. He throws a snowball into his friend's garden.
sentences.chinese: 他把一個雪球扔進了他朋友的院子裏。
就是啊，我的貓咪小雪球是很可愛，可它也夠瘋的。

sentences.english: Their white, bushy bodies are cute, look like a tiny snowball.
sentences.chinese: 雪白的身體毛茸茸的，縮起來像是一個小雪球。

sentences.english: A girl throws a snowball at a couple smoking a water pipe in the al-Zabadani mountains north of Damascus March 11.
sentences.chinese: 月11日，一位姑娘向一對正在抽水煙的夫婦投雪球。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to get a group of people to cohere.
sentences.chinese: 你把一團雪捏緊，雪就黏合成雪球。

sentences.english: Walking along the road, I was snowballed by my son.
sentences.chinese: 沿着街道散步時，我兒子的雪球擊中了我。

sentences.english: These "dirty snowballs" castoff gas and dust whenever they venture near the sun.
sentences.chinese: 這些“髒雪球”在冒險接近太陽時會丟出氣體和塵埃。

definition: Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
